title: Calories in Kit Kat Miniatures
meta_description: Learn calories in kit kat miniatures per piece, with full nutrition facts including carbs, fat, protein, sugars, and serving variations for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard 15 g milk chocolate Kit Kat miniature bar with crispy wafer filling; Nestl√© formulation.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe changes, and regional differences. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Kit Kat miniature provides about 79 calories, mainly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Kit Kat miniature?
What are the carbs in Kit Kat miniatures?
faqs.a: About 8.9 g carbs per miniature, including 7.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Kit Kat miniatures?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.7 g total fat, with 2.6 g saturated fat per piece.

faqs.q: Do Kit Kat miniatures have protein?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1.1 g protein per miniature from the wafer and chocolate.

faqs.q: Calories in Kit Kat miniatures per 100 g?
faqs.a: Around 525 kcal per 100 g, scaling up from per-piece values.
